document.full_text: nato's plans to withdraw its troops from afghanistan and transfer security to afghan forces by the end of 2014 are premature, a russian envoy said on thursday.
document.title: nato 2014 afghan pullout premature: russian envoy
lines_and_colors: nato's plans to withdraw its troops from afghanistan and transfer security to afghan forces by the end of 2014 are premature, a russian envoy said on thursday.
